title: View Changes Between Commits
description: Git is a popular version control system that allows developers to track changes made to their codebase over time. One of the most useful features of Git is the ability to view changes between two commits. This can be helpful when trying to understand what changes were made to a codebase, or when trying to identify the cause of a bug.

meta.title: View Changes Between Commits: A Git Playground Challenge
meta.description: Explore the powerful version control features of Git and learn how to view changes between commits.
meta.keywords: version control, git labs, git, commit, git playground, changes
